TextBlock.Text: Balagas: Yep... this sure is one big ball O' gas. Just don't move too fast or else it'll be a pain finding your way back to the center.
This moon might be the one that contributes most to the tidal forces that heat up MagMag. As for what gas this is; I don't know. Doesn't take a chemist to know it isn't breathable though.
Speaking of gas, how'd this moon accumulate so much of it? It's core is so tiny!
